channel.title: How do u add shops?
channel.description: ill give a lvl 61 acc if u help me make a shopping mall[br][size=1]Posted at: December 20, 2006, 06:37:37 PM[/size][hr]plz help me

item.title: How do u add shops?
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

ok if u dont understand^^ then get auburys id # now go to clientjava and search for his id# and u shud get like wanneshop = ## or something ok copy } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop and go to bottom of ur shop list paste it, and now change his id to like 535 and make it like this } else if (NPCID == 535) { //store name PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 98; now go to autospawn and add that npc to where u want ur shop to be and then go to shops.cfg and put in

shop = 98 put_as_spaces 2 2 item# item amount replace the item stuff with numbers

Read full topic

item.title: How do u add shops?
item.dc:creator: @Crazyman Crazyman
item.description:
@Crazyman wrote:

you get a npc id that is a shop person, and u add that to the autospawn, go to client.java search Aubury

and ull see where to put the stuff, like Shop #(when u add the shop(like what u want it to sell)) and shop npc id

Read full topic
